name: Toweriors
description:
A Kingdom Rush inspired 2d Tower Defense game where you must defend against increasing waves of enemies by building and upgrading various types of towers.

Earn money by defeating enemies or calling waves early, and use the money to upgrade towers to improve your chances of defeating the enemies.

This game was made from January 3rd to January 19th 2022 for the App Game Kit Tower Defense competition. Hope you enjoy! Thanks for playing!

Graphics by CraftPix, Music by various artists (attribution included in ZIP).

Created using AGK Sharp
